<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>x_snc_empra_cycle</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>x_snc_empra_vote_cast</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Votes Cast</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	current.addEncodedQuery('candidate.voting_cycle=' + parent.sys_id );

})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>candidate</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jacob</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-15 19:01:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>339ef57fdbd933002fa93c61ef9619a7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Votes Cast</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Employee Recognition Assessment" source="x_snc_empra">bd776ec313b83300a957721a6144b074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee Recognition Assessment">bd776ec313b83300a957721a6144b074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_339ef57fdbd933002fa93c61ef9619a7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jacob</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-15 19:25:09</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=339ef57fdbd933002fa93c61ef9619a7"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_bf246921db9933002fa93c61ef961986
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_empra_candidate</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>update candidates count</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	updateCycle( current.voting_cycle.getRefRecord() );
	
	if (current.voting_cycle != previous.voting_cycle)
		updateCycle( previous.voting_cycle.getRefRecord() );
	
	function countCandidates(cycle) {
		var count = 0;
		var ga = new GlideAggregate( 'x_snc_empra_candidate' );
		ga.addEncodedQuery('voting_cycle=' + cycle.sys_id + '^approval=approved' );
		ga.addAggregate('COUNT');
		ga.query();
		if (ga.next()) count = ga.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return count;
	}
	
	function updateCycle(cycle) {
		if (cycle.isValidRecord()) {
			cycle.candidates_count = countCandidates(cycle);
			cycle.update();
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jacob</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-08 17:33:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bf246921db9933002fa93c61ef961986</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>update candidates count</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Employee Recognition Assessment" source="x_snc_empra">bd776ec313b83300a957721a6144b074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee Recognition Assessment">bd776ec313b83300a957721a6144b074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bf246921db9933002fa93c61ef961986</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jacob</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-08 20:17:24</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bf246921db9933002fa93c61ef961986"/></record_update>
